summary: A flight manifest for a Boeing 727-31 aircraft (tail number N908JE) operated by JEGE, INC., documenting a flight on January 1, 2004, from Palm Beach, Florida (PBI) to St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands (STT). The sole passenger listed is Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as the sole passenger on a private flight from Palm Beach, Florida, to St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands.

events.title: Private Flight to St. Thomas
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein traveled as the sole passenger on a private Boeing 727 (N908JE) from Palm Beach, Florida (PBI) to St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands (STT).

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was the sole passenger on a private flight on January 1, 2004.
The flight was operated by JEGE, INC., using a Boeing 727-31 aircraft with tail number N908JE.
The flight originated from Palm Beach International Airport (PBI) in Florida and was destined for St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands (STT).
